name: Magic Games (BaraJam2021 submission/ NSFW)
description:
Too late to even try writing a proper description. This is a super early prototype and I hope entering it here will get some eyes on it because https://twitter.com/ArtThrax  worked really hard on the art.

So far enemy AI and Player attacks work but neither a victory or a defeat state has been implemented yet. There's also a couple of enemy animations missing.

Both the shop and deck edit mode are working if you want to play around in them. To enter deck edit mode, press W/Triangle button in the HUB, and leave either scene with the D button. While in either shop or deck edit, you can press W/Triangle button to Sort the cards in your deck/inventory.

RULES

Move your character through your 3x3 grid with the arrow keys/d-pad to avoid enemy fire. Use your spell cards with the A/S/D keys to deal damage. Higher number means higher damage. 

As you use spells, your clothes will vanish which will lower your defense. Try using the Q Key/Left shoulder button to charge up your MP. You won't be able to move as you do it but it's a necessary risk to keep attacking. Good news is that the enemy follows the same rules and they will also need to recharge every once in a while. 

If your cards are all flashing white, press the W key to use a combo attack, which will use most of your MP.

CONTROLS

Arrows / D-Pad = Move character, move cursor

Enter/ Start Button = Pause/Confirm/Proceed dialogue/Buy

Keyboard A /Square Button/X Button = left card/Proceed dialogue/Buy

Keyboard S /Triangle Button/Y  Button = middle card/shuffle card

Keyboard D/ Circle Button/ B Button = right card/cancel/return

Keyboard Q/Left Shoulder Button = Charge up MP/regenerate clothes

Keyboard W/ R1 Button/ Right Shoulder Button = Activate combo when cards flash
